summary: AS I WAS DRIVING DOWN THE HIGHWAY AT 70 PLUS MPH MY CAR LOST ACCELERATION POWER THIS MAKES THE 3 TIME IT HAS DONE THIS, BUT THIS TIME I WAS STUCK IN THE FAST LANE WITH NOW POWER BECAUSE A CAR WAS IN THE SLOW LANE, I WAS STUCK I HAD TO THROW ON MY EMERGENCY BLINKERS AND WAIT BEFORE I COULD GET OVER TO THE SHOULDER I HAD CARS LOCKING IT UP BEHIND ME ABOUT HITTING ME. THIS IS VERY VERY DANGEROUS. AS I WAS LOOKING UP WHAT IT COULD BE I HAVE SEEN MULTIPLE COMPLAINTS ABOUT THIS, I DON'T UNDERSTAND WHY THIS HASN'T BEEN LOOKED INTO MY CAR IS A 2014 CAR WITH LESS THEN 50K MILES.
